content.p: Showcasing the projects of the next generation of architects and building engineers. Each year we celebrate the project work of our Architecture and Built Environment students with an exhibition of their designs, showcasing some of the fantastic work of the next generation of architects and building engineers. You can view our 2024 exhibition, exhibit!24, from Thursday 20 June to Friday 19 July 2024 (9am-4pm) across the Architecture and Built Environment Department. Can't make it in person? Explore our students' projects and designs online. exhibit!24 See our students' work. View architecture courses. See where Architecture and Built Environment students learn. See what graduates do now.
